models.metrics: Key performance indicators displayed on the dashboard including revenue, session counts, and utilization rates.
models.revenueBreakdown: Revenue split between session fees and inventory sales for the current period.
models.lowStockAlerts: Inventory items that have fallen below their minimum stock threshold.
models.recentActivity: Latest operations performed in the system for the activity feed.
models.revenueChart: Historical revenue data points for the trend chart.

relationships: Metrics aggregate data from Sessions, Customers, Subscriptions, and Resources
Revenue breakdown sums Session amounts and InventoryConsumption totals
Low stock alerts reference Inventory items below their min_stock threshold
Recent activity logs reference Sessions, Invoices, and Customers

recentActivity.description: Ahmed started session on Seat A3
